field.name: summary
field.value: Open Generic component does not work on Mono

field.name: description
field.value:
Open Generic type registration does not work on latest Mono (2.12) and raises error.
container.Register(Component.For(typeof(IList<>)).UsingFactoryMethod((k, c) => Activator.CreateInstance(return typeof(List<>).MakeGenericType(c.GenericArguments))));

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: did it work on previous version of mono? What's the error

comment.author: Kamyar.Inanloo
comment.text: It did not work in 3. I have not tested on 2.5 You can reproduce the error easily. Anyway, I am trying to find & fix it.

comment.author: Kamyar.Inanloo
comment.text: Dear Kozmic, the problem is that ComponentModel.Implementation is late bound, and you have put a TODO there. I think doing the TODO may resolve the problem.

comment.author: Kamyar.Inanloo
comment.text: Fixed the problem by just adding an 'ImplementedBy(typeof(IList<>))' to the registration, before UsingFactoryMethod.
